page.title: 12Annual Events, Evesham.
page.content: Every year lots of{events}go on in Evesham.There are things like the{fun {run}when lots of people come every year to run around the town centre. Some wear fancy-dress. Another thing is the{Cropthorne Walkabout}when lots of people walk around looking at the villagers' gardens and having teas, listening to bands and watching Morris Dancers. The things that I like best are the{Hampton pancake race}and the Mop.{The Mop}is the fair on Evesham's Crown Meadow. It began many years ago when farm workers hired themselves out for a year's work and there were a few sideshows. The other thing that I like is the big{November 5th bonfire}on the Crown Meadow. The{Evesham Horticult- {ural Show}is very good as well.
